inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Mace', 'Damage', 15); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Morningstar', 'Damage', 15); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Flail', 'Damage', 15); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Advanced Training, Maces
description: You gain an additional +15 to damage with maces, morningstars, and flails.
